knimeNode.name: Recursive Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: The loop start node for recursion. This type of loop enables you to receive data from the loop end.

fullDescription.intro:
Using the recursive loop construct you have the possibility to receive a data table passed to a corresponding loop end back in the loop start node.
First the loop start node needs an initialization table. This table is output in the first iteration of the recursive loop.
The corresponding loop end receives a data table and passes it back to the loop start node. Starting with the second iteration of the recursive loop the loop start node outputs the data as inserted into the loop end in the previous run.

ports.outPort: The data from the loop end.
